scripts.test: npm run build && ulimit -n 1024; NODE_ENV=test mocha --require backbone-rest/test/parameters_express4 '{node_modules/backbone-{orm,rest}/,}test/{issues,spec}/**/*.tests.coffee' --grep ''
scripts.test-quick: npm run build && ulimit -n 1024; NODE_ENV=test mocha --require backbone-rest/test/parameters_express4 'node_modules/backbone-orm/test/spec/**/*.tests.coffee' --grep '@no_cache @no_embed'
scripts.test-self: npm run build && ulimit -n 1024; NODE_ENV=test mocha '{node_modules/backbone-orm/,}test/{issues,spec}/**/*.tests.coffee' --grep ''
scripts.build_dep: npm run-script backbone-orm build; npm run-script backbone-rest build
scripts.watch_dep: npm run-script backbone-orm watch; npm run-script backbone-rest watch
